html:
6.16.17  9:06 pm   how's the new song coming along?

     good

6.16.17  8:57 pm   Did you know that books and spices make the same sound when being distributed across Europe?

     did you know that i might not have infinite sounds

6.16.17  7:58 pm   Hey bill, how do you deal with people that are wrong? Not just "I asked for a cappucino not a burger" wrong, but "I live my life only to produce the world's best cappucinos, while the obvious choice is to produce the world's best burgers?" I hope that makes sense

     i'm not sure how you would know whether someone else's life decisions are wrong

6.16.17  6:10 pm   how many variations of the umbrella do you have

     youtube, twitter, vine (not currently online), spotify, patreon, twitch, discord, vidme. i might have used the same one for some of those last ones

6.16.17  6:06 pm   when will you post more content

     i do it all the time. when will you start noticing

6.16.17  5:32 pm   How did you get the umbrella icon on Spotify? I thought you had problems with that. -Bogg

     it used to be impossible, but many people on this page informed me that they recently started allowing artists to have more control over their profile, and someone gave me instructions on how to do it. thank you to that person. now if only someone could figure out how to get on pandora

6.16.17  4:45 pm   The world is full of suffering, and people are naturally inclined to evil. Your music typically displays a very positive outlook on love, humanity, and the world. Do you choose to live in willful ignorance of these facts or is your intent to make the world a somewhat happier place via your music?

     everything you've ever enjoyed and every good time you've ever had used to not be possible. none of the greatest things we are and do used to exist. it used to be just rocks. i'd say things are looking up

6.16.17  3:45 pm   Why do you think people enjoy viewing your music/videos?

     that is up to them to decide. or maybe they don't have to decide if they don't want o

      What, in ur opinion, makes them appealing?

     i'm just trying to make them how i think they should be. or, for a thrill, sometimes i try to make them how they should not be

6.16.17  1:55 pm   Hey dude, you should put your new songs on youtube. There's no need for editing and shit, just put the title like you did with we could just get high (just to make the channel seem more active while you make other content). Yes, this is a good use of your youtube channel.

     i think you may be right, but i'm still not quite sure yet. i am really feeling the pressure to do it, which is nice, it helps me think clearly

6.16.17  1:33 pm   not answering questions... does that mean you're deep into recording?

     yes, need every minute i can get

     :DDD also, what's your opinion on smileys?

     they seem to look happy

6.16.17  12:48 pm   I noticed that you get a lot of repeated questions about "why don't you put ads on your videos" and "where are the videos, why do your videos take so long?" You don't seem to like those types of questions very much so I would suggest making an FAQ at the very top of the ueqstions page with those questions on it so hopefully you don't have to deal with those questions any longer. What do you think?

     i don't think that would stop anyone from asking those questions, but it would make the page look more complicated

6.16.17  12:25 pm   have you found out the meaning of 'yicyig noop skytha kacdu ufoi fupes yahej i dug tyts eoches frozum prery?' yet?

     no

6.16.17  12:13 pm   do you think it is possible to learn how to play a drum kit with little to no access to one? I've been a percussionist for years (marching band snare, djembe in church, etc.) but can't drum on an actual drum where i live. i desperately want to expand my abilities so I can just sit down at a set and play without feeling totally lost. i know i need a lot more limb independence and just straight up muscle memory to do that.... do you think it's possible to develop those any other way?

     you can probably get pads that use a kick pedal, and you'll also need some regular drum pads, and then get like 3 or 4 snare stands, make sure they can go up high (so you can simulate the position of a high hat) and get a drum throne. and sticks which you surely already have. or if you've got a lot more money, you could get an electronic drum kit. you already have stick technique, but getting a kick pedal and some way to play a pad with it will be helpful because learning to use a kick pedal is it's own thing, just like learning to use the sticks

6.16.17  12:04 pm   Trying to reach you for a Paramount tv series

     here is my email

6.16.17  10:27 am   Did you ever read all the quotes you had in your (previous) apartment?

     probably most of them but maybe not

6.16.17  10:17 am   what time signature was movie star originally in when you wrote in 2015?

     i couldn't decide, although i suggested 9 or 11 for the total number of beats in the cycle. i wasn't quite sure but i knew i wanted to let that second chord hang there for a slightly unpredictable amount of beats, while keeping the quarter note constant. i made a suggestion of 9 and then thought about it for a minute trying to figure out what's best and i ultimately couldn't decide. when i recorded it i settled on 9 for the total. which is really more like 2 bars, so you can call it 4 plus 5 or who knows, 3 and 6 if you prefer, or in that case maybe just 3 although that's not the way i think of it

6.16.17  8:28 am   bill you haven't answered questions for 24 hours, are you okay?

     yes just trying to finish this darn song on time which may or may not be possible
6.16.17  7:46 am   What are your opinions on opinions

6.16.17  7:36 am   Why don't you ever show drums in your live music videos

     because you can't play drums in a video without actually making drum sounds in the building you are in, in real life, which happens to be extremely loud and can be heard for miles. i hope that makes sense

6.16.17  5:52 am   Do you experience emotions

     yes, maybe even too much
6.16.17  5:50 am   why do you type in lower case only
6.16.17  5:43 am   Where do you record? Somewhere legit like a fancy studio or just your bedroom etc

6.16.17  3:55 am   i lie so much because it makes a more compelling sstory. help me stop?

     i'm not sure if i believe you

6.16.17  1:59 am   I know how to say "oh hell yeah" and "I respect your opinion" while having no concept of capitalizing and grammar... Can I be your assistant and answer questions?

     i don't think you have the right skill set

6.16.17  1:15 am   in hotewig, you wrote the tenth commandment as "don't want to do any of the things i just told you not to do," but since the actual commandment is "thou shalt not covet thy neighbor" et al, wouldn't yours have said something like "don't be jealous" or somethin? still the best vid ever tho!

     there are many different variations of the commandments, and they have changed over time, but i did a lot of research into it in order to build the list i used. from what i found, it seemed that that commandment really (originally) meant that you're not supposed to want stuff that you are not supposed to have. the neighbor part seemed to have been added later, or only in some versions, if i remember correctly. at least that is the way it looked when i was doing the research. keep in mind this was a very long video and i don't exactly remember the details but i do remember that i did quite a bit of research just for that one screen that lasts maybe 1 second, and i was very careful to try to reflect the actual commandments as accurately as possible while still making it a rowdy fun time. when in doubt i tried to go for the older/original meaning, because there are so many different variations

6.16.17  12:10 am   bill i loved the sound of fourths juxtaposed but don't know how to use it in pop songs context can you please help me?

     i'm not sure exactly what you mean by juxtaposed, but you can make anything 'pop' as long as you can convince the listener it's important (hint: you can use words to do this)

6.15.17  11:22 pm   you think you're gonna be able to release your new song next tuesday?

     i will try my best

6.15.17  10:29 pm   why do you go through the hassle of posting your songs on sites like spotify, apple music, etc.

     i can think of 2 reasons. spotify is extremely popular and it seems like the normal way most people listen to music these days. also if my music does well on the music sites/stores etc, then it is a source of income (money)

6.15.17  8:36 pm   is it selfish/stupid to not share the things i have created?

     it depends whether you want to

6.15.17  7:31 pm   explain conciousness to me

     it's you wanting to know

6.15.17  7:29 pm   is a songwriter someone who has meticulously studied songs and all the boring stuff that makes you better or anyone who has ever written a song

     i think if you have written at least 2 songs and you plan to write more, then you can be considered a songwriter, if you want

6.15.17  4:14 pm   Is your whole site in comic sans or is it my default font ? also hi

     it must be your default font. this site doesn't use any fonts except for maybe the expert mode link on the front page

6.15.17  3:59 pm   if u were a carrot what would you be?

     a carrot, i suppose

6.15.17  3:50 pm   congrats on the umbrella avi on spotify!

     ah thank you, and thanks to everyone who showed me that it's possible now

6.15.17  2:50 pm   How come you NEVER reply to ANY comments on Youtube? Even the ones with the most likes? And how come you never pin any comments either?

     i used to, but after history of japan it got way too crazy. i do the questions page here as an alternative

6.15.17  2:24 pm   why are you so passionate about time and space?

     it's how the world works. at least it's how this one works

6.15.17  2:23 pm   Do you really wanna make videos or do you feel obligated to because your audience demands them?

     i usually try to do a slightly different thing than my audience demands. then afterwards they usually start to demand more of that new thing, and then i do another slightly different thing

6.15.17  12:01 pm   India-pakistan cricket final is on Sunday. It is among the biggest sports rivalries, if not the biggest. You gonna watch?

     i don't even have enough time to finish the songs on time. how am i gonna watch sports games

6.15.17  11:50 am   for your songs that have videos, did you let randomization pick out which songs to make videos of or did you choose those songs yourself?

     i'm not sure if i've ever done that. but that is something i would do

6.15.17  11:43 am   has there been a good hook you came up with that you regret turning into a short jingle instead of a full length song?

     not really, i can still do it. there are 5 vines that are also in the songs list, because they could be full songs even though they were already used for vines
6.15.17  10:53 am   Why 240

6.15.17  10:08 am   For your 2nd history video, why did you choose the entire world?

     because i was ready
6.15.17  9:44 am   ketchup or mustard?

6.15.17  9:30 am   What part of the song-writing process takes the longest for you (excluding recording, editing, mixing, etc) Once you have a basic melody/chord sequence in mind are you able to come up with a full arrangement pretty quickly?

     the full arrangement is not included in the songwriting process. for me that happens when i record it

6.15.17  8:45 am   Know any good riddles? What about a good paradox to think about?

     it's a different time now than it is now

6.15.17  8:42 am   Please help! What's a good thing to do pass the time and entertain yourself when you are bored (like on a long plane, train, or bus ride) and you don't have any phone, internet, music, book, etc.?

     find the prime factorization of large numbers. see if you can find any serial numbers or bar codes on anything around you, and find the prime factorization of that number

6.15.17  7:45 am   What would you do if nobody asked you questions?

     i think the more important question is what would i Not do. and the answer is answer questions

6.15.17  7:10 am   Which beans are the best beans?

     i have not ranked the beans

6.15.17  7:09 am   What do you think of social media?

     it seems like something that could really catch on

6.15.17  7:07 am   2014. was good for everyone, was it good for you?

     i distinctly remember everyone on twitter saying during 2014 that 2014 was the worst possible year there could ever be. but it was great for me because i started making copious amounts of videos, on a steady basis, and posting them online
